Digital Twin v1 is Weeks Away!

The first version of Digital Twin will feature messaging and video calling.

Sam Taggart

19 February 2021

Recreate your digital life with Digital Twin. Where only you own your data, and no one else.

The first version of Digital Twin is weeks away and will come with private and secure messaging and video calling. After that, we’ll bring you a way to store your files – and much more.

twinupdate

Happy Holidays!

Let’s take a moment to acknowledge what a year it’s been for all of us around the world.

DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold’s decentralized Grid

The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned – both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.
